#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int

ll gcd(ll a ,ll b)
{
    if(b>a){
        ll t = a;
        a =b ;
        b=t;
    }
    while(b){
        ll t =a%b;
        a= b;
        b = t;
    }
    return a;
}
int main()
{
    /*int t; scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int a,b,an =0,n=0;    ---------------- TREEROOT
        scanf("%d",&n);
        while(n--){
            scanf("%d" "%d",&a,&b); an+=(a-b);
        }
         printf("%d\n",an);
    }*/
    /*int t; scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        ll n,gc,tmp,s , f=0; scanf("%lld",&n); s=n;n--;scanf("%lld",&gc);
        while(n--){
                //cout<<"yo";
            scanf("%lld",&tmp);    ------------------ SUBGCD
            if(f==0) gc= gcd(gc,tmp);
            if(gc==1){
                f=1;
            }
        }
        if(f==1) printf("%lld\n",s);
        else printf("-1\n");
    }*/
    int t; scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int n; scanf("%d",&n); n /=2;
        printf("%d\n", n/2 * (n-n/2));
    }
    return 0;


}
